body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Father of Thomas B. Wadlington, Penney U. Wadlington, Charles W. Wadlington, William J. Wadlington, and Margaret Wadlington. Resident of Caldwell County in 1820. Owned six enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1820. Resident of Caldwell County in 1830. Resident of Caldwell County in 1840. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned thirty-eight enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.
